entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 12:01 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:01 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:01 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
